dialogue.text: Hi! You look like you need help.
dialogue.zh:
嗨! 你 look like 你 需要 幫忙.
こんにちは! あなた look like あなた 必要 手伝う.

dialogue.text: Yes, the brown bread is sold out.
dialogue.zh:
是的, the brown bread 是 sold 缺.
はい, the brown bread 私 sold out.

dialogue.text: Sorry about that. Are you looking for whole wheat?
dialogue.zh:
Sorry about that. 是 你 在找 whole wheat?
Sorry about that. Are あなた 探して for whole wheat?

是的, whole wheat bread.
はい, whole wheat bread.

dialogue.text: We have whole wheat rolls instead.
dialogue.zh:
We 有 whole wheat rolls instead.
We have whole wheat rolls instead.

That could work.
That could work.

dialogue.text: Do you need sliced bread for sandwiches?
dialogue.zh:
你 需要 sliced bread sandwiches?
Do あなた 必要 sliced bread for sandwiches?

是的, sandwiches.
はい, for sandwiches.

dialogue.text: We have a similar brand on the next shelf.
dialogue.zh:
We 有 a similar brand on the next shelf.
We have a similar brand on the next shelf.

好的, let me see.
わかりました, let me see.

dialogue.text: This one is whole grain and sliced.
dialogue.zh:
This one 是 whole grain and sliced.
This one 私 whole grain and sliced.

太好了.
いいですね.

dialogue.text: Do you want it with or without seeds?
dialogue.zh:
你 想要 it with or without seeds?
Do あなた want it with or without seeds?

Without seeds, 請.
Without seeds, お願いします.

This pack 是 fresh—baked today.
This pack 私 fresh—baked today.

Perfect.
Perfect.

dialogue.text: Would you like two packs or one?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like two packs or one?
Would あなた like two packs or one?

One 是 fine.
One 私 fine.

Anything else 你 需要?
Anything else あなた 必要?

Maybe peanut butter.
Maybe peanut butter.

We 有 crunchy and smooth.
We have crunchy and smooth.

Smooth, 請.
Smooth, お願いします.

任何 size preference?
Any size preference?

小 jar.
スモール jar.

dialogue.text: Alright. Let me know if you need more help.
dialogue.zh:
Alright. Let me know if 你 需要 more 幫忙.
Alright. Let me know if あなた 必要 more 手伝う.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

不 problem.
いいえ problem.

謝謝 你.
ありがとう あなた.

有 a nice day!
Have a nice day!

你 too!
あなた too!
